item.title: By: Paul L Fancher
item.dc:creator: Paul L Fancher
item.description:
Hi. thanks for your thorough comparison of the camera modules for the RPi.
I'm thinking about using a RPi with one of these modules as a surveillance camera and i want it to be able to capture car license plates at night (Using some IR lighting to illuminate the alley). We have a nervy thief who regularly does a comeback in neighborhood.
I'm trying to not make a wrong purchase and your review is very valuable.
which one of these modules do you think can capture license plates at night? I'm gonna mount it right on my wall next to the alley and probably mount an IR projector under it.
item.content:encoded:
Hi. thanks for your thorough comparison of the camera modules for the RPi.

I’m thinking about using a RPi with one of these modules as a surveillance camera and i want it to be able to capture car license plates at night (Using some IR lighting to illuminate the alley).
We have a nervy thief who regularly does a comeback in neighborhood.

I’m trying to not make a wrong purchase and your review is very valuable.

which one of these modules do you think can capture license plates at night? I’m gonna mount it right on my wall next to the alley and probably mount an IR projector under it.

item.title: By: Andrew

item.description: Can you please update and post more photos of the IR Cut in action in comparison to the other cameras? An IR Light source would also be great for this comparison.
